summary: Build D'ZETA app starting from homepage, now expanding scope to include an admin login and admin dashboard (with Internet Identity authentication) for managing menu/queue/zones.
architectural_notes: Use Internet Identity for admin authentication (no admin access exists yet; must be built explicitly).

existing_features.title: Ensure the /admin route is protected by an admin-only gate that (1) prompts unauthenticated users to log in with Internet Identity, (2) blocks authenticated non-admin users with an access denied message, and (3) renders the admin dashboard only for authenticated admin users.
Ensure the admin dashboard loads and its existing panels can fetch data and perform mutations end-to-end (as currently implemented), including at minimum the Orders/Queue panel and Analytics panel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement admin login and authentication using Internet Identity
Build admin dashboard to manage menu, queue (antrean), zones, and related admin functions

Implement/verify backend admin authorization APIs required by the frontend admin gate and admin dashboard, including an isCallerAdmin query and ensuring all admin dashboard data/actions are guarded by admin permissions.

Add a secure bootstrap mechanism to assign at least one initial admin so the admin dashboard can be accessed after deployment (without manual code edits), and document the expected flow in developer-facing comments.
